attributes.action: Stop BBC leftist anti-Israel bias. Make the Balen report public.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The BBC is using tax payers' money trying to prevent the release of a report which is believed to be highly critical of their middle east coverage.

Suspicions are that the report, which is believed to run to 20,000 words, includes evidence of anti-Israeli bias in news programming.
